extensionDescription.message: The add-on uses dict.cc to translate words and phrases in any website, epub or pdf. In-page translation. No need to select the word, just click on it!

noQuickKeys.message: You need to specify at least one key for the quick click.

refreshFailed.message:
Failed to retrieve language list from dict.cc!
Please try again later.

confirm_removeAll.message: Do you really want to remove all entries?

confirm_restore_defaults.message: Do you really want to reset all settings to their defaults?

tabs_context_enable__title.message: Add translation options to the context menu.

tabs_results_micropanel_title.message: Click on a micro panel result shows as

tabs_result_asPanel.message: Use an overlay panel instead of a popup

tabs_result_asPanel__title.message: An overlay panel is like a window but without the border and titlebar. Once you click somewhere outside of it, it disappears.

tabs_result_multiWindow.message: Create a new window/tab for every request

tabs_result_multiWindow__title.message: Uncheck this if you want to reuse the last tab for the results.

tabs_quick_enable__title.message: This will use the first translation (in the translation list) to search for words you click on while holding the selected keys.

tabs_quick_selected__title.message: Prefer selected text (if there is any) to the word under the cursor.

tabs_quick_right.message: Enable right click for more options

tabs_quick_right__title.message: Show all translations instead of the context menu when quick right clicking.

tabs_quick_keys_ctrl__title.message: You need to press the ctrl key to use quick click.

tabs_quick_keys_shift__title.message: You need to press the shift key to use quick click.

tabs_quick_keys_alt__title.message: You need to press the alt key to use quick click.

tabs_quick_keys_warning_shift.message: In newer Firefox versions, using shift as only modifier causes problems with the quick context menu.

tabs_quick_keys_warning_alt.message: In multi-process Firefox, using alt as only modifier causes problems.

tabs_quick_rocker__title.message: Holding right mouse, then pressing left mouse for quick translation and vice versa for a context menu.

tabs_language_list__title.message: The list of translations to add to the menu.

tabs_language_modify_up__title.message: Move the selected item up in the list.

tabs_language_modify_down__title.message: Move the selected item down in the list.

tabs_language_modify_edit__title.message: Change the label of the selected entry.

tabs_language_modify_remove__title.message: Remove the selected entry from the list.

tabs_language_add_refresh__title.message: Refresh the list of available languages from dict.cc.

tabs_language_add_do__title.message: Add a new entry using the selected values.
